Articles.Content: Hi, how do I install KerbalFoundries? I'm thinking of using tracks for a versatile exploration rover.

KF is great.

Have you used other mods? This is no different, download and unzip and drop the contents of the Game Data folder into KSP’s GameData folder.

hope that helps!

Done! Thank you, now I can build my rover. It's using the Mole tracks on the sides and has a Mk3 cargo bay, which I've converted into a science room where they can work in while moving over the surface.
Glad you are enjoying it.  And thanks @Nightside for the tech support

I did notice a glitch. When I landed my rover on the surface of the Mun, the wheels disappeared and the tracks stopped moving, but still provided thrust. The anti-grav engines are really cool, and are pretty much a cheaty way of making a VTOL. I just need to add retro thrusters...
